name: part_015
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY2】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage3 DAY2【チラ見せ】 [CVYbI-1IJnM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_015.mov

scenes.description: AZKi finishing her performance and waving to the audience.
Stage transition with audience cheering as lights go down.
Intro video for the final performance of Stage 3 featuring Shirakami Fubuki and Sakura Miko.
Shirakami Fubuki and Sakura Miko performing 'Kimi ni Mogyutto!'.
